items.sentence: You could stay with us in Boston if you want.
You could do that right now if you wanted to.
You could be doing that now if you wanted to.
You can still do that pretty well, can't you?
You can do that better than anyone else here.
You always do that in the evening, don't you?
You should've waited until Monday to do that.
You should've done that before you went home.
You should try to resist the urge to do that.
You should stay here with us for a few weeks.
You should be able to do that in three hours.
You promised us you wouldn't do that anymore.
You promised that you wouldn't do that again.
You never thought I'd do that again, did you?
You never really enjoyed doing that, did you?
You never got the chance to do that, did you?
You never expected to do that again, did you?
You need to know the reasons why we did that.
You know I didn't want to do that, don't you?
You're not allowed to hunt in national parks.
It's been three days since I've taken a bath.
Mary told me that she didn't love me anymore.
This issue doesn't need to be resolved today.
Was the voice you heard a man's or a woman's?
Tom was the only student who failed the exam.
Tom was late because there was a traffic jam.
The petals were scarlet with streaks of gold.
I think both Tom and Mary are still homesick.
Tom and Mary were both pretty busy yesterday.
Tom thought that his parents were infallible.
Their trip was postponed because of the rain.
Your marks were well below average this term.
Tom has committed a number of serious crimes.
Are there any good places to ski around here?
I took it for granted that Tom would help us.
You're going to wait here for me, aren't you?
We hope that you all will sign this petition.
Tom had a few more drinks and then went home.
It looks like Tom just came to cause trouble.
Tom isn't a guitar teacher. He teaches piano.
Tom said that Mary was likely to be finished.
I know I have to do it. I just don't want to.
My coat has a hood, but I hardly ever use it.
I was very sleepy and fell asleep right away.
Do you know those children swimming with Tom?
Do you know if Tom can come with us tomorrow?
That story was very hard for me to listen to.
This is a list of things that we need to buy.
I've only lived in Australia for three years.
We hope to see you back in Boston again soon.
